## yoto cp

Copy a track between playlists

```
yoto cp <src_playlist/track> <dest_playlist[/position]> [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  yoto cp "Bedtime/1" "Lullabies/"
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for cp
```

### Options inherited from parent commands

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.config/yotocli/config.yaml)
```
